question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-compiler-v2/legacy-move-compiler/src/parser/merge_spec_modules.rs] [Function: program()] [Friend declaration allowance] Lines 48 explicitly allows ModuleMember::Friend in spec modules, and line 158 merges these friends - can attackers inject friend declarations to grant attacker-controlled modules access to private functions in the target module?
